game_description: BananaRama is a gtag fan game, that I have made to have fun in with friends or other people who have the game.
review_1: I’ve been playing this game for a while probably like 3 4 or 2 months now it’s really fun just to mess around with your friends. The mods are really nice . You should download it!!
review_3: I been waiting for so long and it finally came out, 5 stars
review_5: I keep games safe by reporting and I did keep your game safe to keep thing more safe is becoming a mod I will kick that break the rules
